question: Hi!   My boyfriend has had bad pain around eye and down in jaw for several days.  This is affecting his sleep.  He also has body aches and pains.Does this sound like a sinus infection?  He also has type 2 diabetes.  He took 2 tablets of benadryl and all it did was make him sleepy.  The clinic we go to requires advance notice appointments.  Any suggestions for relief would be greatly appreciated.  Thank-you!!!
title: Sinus?
